text: Ilona Staller (born 26 November 1951), mainly known by her stage name Cicciolina ("little chubby one"), is a Hungarian-Italian former porn star, politician, and singer. She was born in Budapest, Hungary. She was a member of the Radical Party and Love Party. Staller was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1987 to 1992. She unsuccessfully ran for Mayor of Milan in 2004. Staller offered to have sex with President of Iraq Saddam Hussein and Al-Qaeda leader Osama bin Laden in order to have world peace. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Italian movie actors Category:Pornographic actors Category:Italian singers Category:Hungarian movie actors Category:Actors from Budapest Category:Politicians from Budapest Category:Hungarian singers Category:Politicians from Milan Category:Actors from Milan
title: Ilona Staller
